exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable y.

exceptions.tactic: assert (H2 : PSeries a n = PSeries b n).
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : nat -> R n : nat r0 : R Heqr0 : CV_radius a = r0 H : 0 < r0 r : R Heqr : CV_radius b = r H0 : 0 < r eps : posreal H1 : forall y : R, ball 0 eps y -> PSeries a y = PSeries b y The term "n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "R".

In environment a, b : nat -> R n : nat r0 : R Heqr0 : CV_radius a = r0 H : 0 < r0 r : R Heqr : CV_radius b = r H0 : 0 < r eps : posreal H1 : forall y : R, ball 0 eps y -> PSeries a y = PSeries b y H2 : R Unable to unify "R" with "a n = b n".

original: intros. unfold locally in H1. destruct H1 as [eps H1]. destruct H1. assert (H2 : PSeries a n = PSeries b n). apply H2. unfold ball. exists eps. intros. apply H3. apply H0.
